content:
after taking care of business at home in a  victory over Eastern Michigan the UCSB womens tennis team begins its threeday Arizona road trip today in Flagstaff against the University of Northern Arizona PERIOD

The Lumberjacks  overall are coming off a  loss against  Boise State last Sunday in Boise PERIOD NAU is a young team with only two seniors on its roster alongside five freshmen PERIOD Thirdyear Head Coach Kim Bruno is still trying to find a winning combination in her team as in this season alone shes fielded  different doubles combinations and has started  different players in six singles spots PERIOD Of those  players only five have started at the same position for five matches or more PERIOD After  matches this season freshman Orsi Golovics holds the best singles record on the team at  but has started at five different spots PERIOD

As for doubles the Lumberjack duo of Amiee Oki and senior Stephanie Vallejos hold the squads best record at  PERIOD Oki and Vallejos have started together at the first second and third spots this season but posted their best record by far in the twospot going  PERIOD Golovics and fellow freshman Edit Suhajda form the only other doubles team with more than four matches played and will most likely fill the onespot for Northern Arizona PERIOD

Saturday the Gauchos  trek  miles south to Tucson Ariz PERIOD for a match against  Arizona PERIOD The Wildcats  started the season  before receiving brutal beat downs from ranked opponents losing to UCLA USC Florida International Long Beach State and Sacramento State by a combined  PERIOD Regardless of their current losing streak Arizona fields the  player in the country in junior Danielle Steinberg who is  in topranked singles this year PERIOD

UCSB will finish off their tour of Arizona in Tempe on Sunday to face off against  Arizona State who earned their first loss in eight games this season against  USC last Tuesday PERIOD Freshman phenomenon Kelcy McKenna starts in the secondranked singles spot for ASU PERIOD

USCB begins their match against the state of Arizona today at  a.m PERIOD in Flagstaff PERIOD

Didnt like your friends significant other so they gifted them an umbrella The word for umbrella san sounds like the word for divorce in Chinese

Believing in horoscopes The modern western zodiac actually came from Babylonian astrology

Walked backwards in Portugal to live out the Faust fantasy In Portugal walking backwards allows the devil to know exactly where you are

Stole a raven from the tower of london as reparations According to UK superstition if there arent  ravens in the tower the kingdom will fall

Breaks a knuckle knocking on wood for good scores on finals Knocking on wood may have originated from the Celts and their love for tree spirits

Drunkenly rearranging their apartment for the feng shui at  AM A Chinese cultural practice that harmonizes a person with the energies of the environment around them

Left out their middle name on their taxes because the Fae run the IRS Giving the Fae your full name gives them power over you and the IRS has too much

Hit by a car but the license plate had an angel number Beyond just blowing up on TikTok angel numbers were invented by.. PERIOD Pythagoras
title: Santa Barbara Looks to Raise Game in Arizona | The Daily Nexus
name: University of California Santa Barbara
